short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Audio Player/Library that works on Chrome(OS)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage and Play your offline-music library.

adiobox for Chrome gives you control of your music library from your Desktop or ChromeOS device.

• Add Folders of Music and sort them
• Drag 'n Drop to Queue songs
• View Library by Album, Artist, or individual Songs
• Create Playlists
• Edit Metadata for your songs
• Google Cast-enabled, allowing you to stream to your Google Chromecast or Google Cast Audio

Sync your music to your phone or tablet and play your music on-the-go with our companion website
(adiobox.naito.co).
Edit your music to display album covers, modify artist or title names.
Using adiobox, you'll be able to load and play your different audio files in one place.
MP3, FLAC, WAV, AAC, and More Soon™.

➤ Terms and Conditions
When you install this extension, you are agreeing to and acknowledging:
adiobox.naito.co/terms
adiobox.naito.co/privacy-policy


➤ What's included?

~ Free
The free version of adiobox:
• Importing any file
• Create and Edit Playlists
• View all imported Artists
• Scroll through your Albums
• Manage and view Songs
• MP3 playback and editing


~ Pro
adiobox Pro includes everything in the free version, but more:
• FLAC, WAV, AAC playback and editing
• Sync library onto mobile device
• Stream to Google Chromecast or Google Cast Audio
